name: Kick Football: Worldcup Soccer Team Challenge
name_original: Kick Football: Worldcup Soccer Team Challenge
description: As we know Champions aren't born. They're made. Do you have what it takes to be the Soccer Superstar? Play Soccer Kicks, the most intense free-kick soccer game to practice your free-kick skills on apple devices. This game will give you the highest level of complete control and pinpoint accuracy. kick football: soccer blocky team lineup challenge is the full of entertain you can Flick the ball to kick it out, Swipe to adjust the direction of the ball while it is in the air, gesture a curve on the screen to curve the ball and many more. If you were playing in the World Cup final, competing against the best teams, making the most spectacular goals and saves and along with graphics that will make you feel as if you were sitting in the first row in Maracan„ Stadium. Perfect your special shots, shoot with special effects, fool your opponent and make the most impressive saves, controlling the ball with one finger, and become the world champion
